sources.name: Solar PV System Costs by Country- Barbose & Darghouth
sources.description:
Data published by Barbose, Galen and Naïm Darghouth (2016). Tracking the Sun IX: The Installed Price of Residential and Non-Residential Photovoltaic Systems in the United States
Link https://emp.lbl.gov/sites/default/files/tracking_the_sun_ix_report.pdf
Retrieved 2017-06-19

Installed price data for Japan, France, and Australia are based on the IEA Photovoltaic Power Systems Programme’s National Survey Reports (IEA-PVPS 2016) and for Germany are based on data compiled by the Center for Solar Energy and Hydrogen Research Baden-Württemberg (ZSW 2016)
